item.description:
Hello Canadians,

The New England Canadian Business Council is organizing a wine reception for alumni of Canadian Universities. This event will take place at the law office for Bingham McCutchen in the financial district. I will be attending and wanted to pass on the invitation to the group. The event will feature a selection of appetizers and Canadian Wine.

The cost is 40 dollars and you must preregistration at http://pancanadalumrecept.eventbrite.com/

You can also mail a check to: Suzanne Storms 3 Alberta Lane, Lakeville, MA 02347 E-mail: necbc@comcast.net Lakeville, MA 02347 Please make sure to include your name, address and email.

Hope to see you on March 28.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Pan-Canadian University Alumni Reception
